暴威: (ぼうい) - tyranny; abuse of power; violence (e.g. of a storm)
暴悪無類: (ぼうあくむるい) - (yoji) incomparably ruthless; diabolical

暴発: (ぼうはつ) - spontaneous discharge; accidental gun discharge

暴虐非道: (ぼうぎゃくひどう) - (yoji) violent and cruel; tyrannical and atrocious
暴行: (ぼうこう) - assault/outrage/act of violence; rape
暴言: (ぼうげん) - reckless remark; rash remark; abusive language; thoughtless words
暴走: (bousou) - agindo precipitadamente, correndo descontroladamente, comportando-se de forma imprudente, direção perigosa, arruaça; fuga (processo), agindo precipitadamente, correndo descontroladamente, comportando-se de forma imprudente, direção perigosa, arruaça; fuga (processo); corrida imprudente em base
暴走族: (ぼうそうぞく) - club of rabble-rousing reckless-driving delinquents; biker gang; group of hot rodders
暴走車: (ぼうそうしゃ) - recklessly driven car; runaway vehicle
暴走運転: (ぼうそううんてん) - reckless driving

暴露話: (ばくろばなし) - revealing talk; insider talk; inside story
暴飲暴食: (ぼういんぼうしょく) - (yoji) drinking and eating too much
暴騰: (ぼうとう) - sudden rise; sharp rise; boom; skyrocketing
暹羅: (シャムロ) - Siam (former name of Thailand)
暹羅鶏: (シャムロけい) - game fowl; gamecock
曇らす: (くもらす) - to encloud; to make dim; to make dull; to tarnish; to obscure; to darken; to muffle
曇らせる: (くもらせる) - to cloud; to make dim or dull; to frown
曇り: (kumori) - cloudiness, cloudy weather; fog (em um espelho, óculos, etc.), cloud (e.g. in marble), blur, mist, shadow, dimness , cloudiness, cloudy weather; fog (on a mirror, glasses, etc.), cloud (e.g. in marble), blur, mist, shadow, dimness; gloom, dejection
曇りがち: (くもりがち) - mainly cloudy; tending to be cloudy
曇り勝ち: (くもりがち) - mainly cloudy; tending to be cloudy
曇る: (くもる) - to get cloudy/to cloud over/to become overcast; to cloud up/to fog up/to mist up/to become dim; to be gloomy/to be clouded (expression)/to be downcast; (from 面曇る)  to look slightly downward (of a noh mask; indicating sadness, grief, etc.)
曇勝ち: (くもりがち) - mainly cloudy; tending to be cloudy

曖昧制御: (あいまいせいぎょ) - fuzzy control

曖昧検索: (あいまいけんさく) - fuzzy reference; ambiguous search; ambiguous retrieval
曖昧模糊: (あいまいもこ) - (yoji) obscure; vague; ambiguous
曖昧茶屋: (あいまいぢゃや) - brothel fronting as a tea house, inn, restaurant, etc.
曙: (しょ) - Aurora, amanhecer, início do dia, começo

曙貴時代: (あけたかじだい) - {sumo} era during mid-1990s dominated by grand champions Akebono and Takanohana II

曝け出す: (さらけだす) - to expose; to disclose; to lay bare; to confess

曝す: (さらす) - to expose (to the air, to the public, to danger, etc.); to bleach/to refine
曝涼: (ばくりょう) - airing of clothes, hanging scrolls, etc. (to prevent damage from insects and mould)
曝首: (しゃりこうべ) - skull (esp. weatherbeaten, used as symbol of death); death's head; cranium
